front.title: Global city teams challenge 2018 kickoff and IES-city framework workshop

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.).

front.abstract: NIST and DHS S co-host the GCTC Smart and Secure Cities and Communities Challenge (SC3) program. The objective is to encourage participating teams to include cybersecurity and privacy as integral project elements in addition to existing GCTC goals such as the replicability, scalability and sustainability of technology and systems. This report highlights the first SC3 event of 2018.
